articles.author: Sarah Moon and Douglas S. Wood, CNN
articles.title: Los Angeles may run out of hospital beds by Christmas as mayor urges residents to 'cancel everything'
articles.description: The mayor of Los Angeles said the city will run out of hospital beds by Christmas if the coronavirus spreads at its current rate as he urged residents to "cancel everything" to help stop the spread of the virus.

articles.title: A volunteer was attacked by a tiger at Carole Baskin's Big Cat Rescue
articles.description: A longtime volunteer at Big Cat Rescue, the Florida animal sanctuary profiled in Netflix's "Tiger King," was attacked by a tiger during a morning feeding, the sanctuary confirmed to CNN.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Supreme Court sides with California religious ministry against state Covid restrictions
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Thursday sided with a California ministry that argued the state's Covid-related restrictions on indoor services violated its religious liberty rights, the court's second such ruling on pandemic guidelines for churches in two weeks.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Jupiter and Saturn will look like a double planet later this month
articles.description: The two largest planets in our solar system, Jupiter and Saturn, are coming closer together than they have been since the Middle Ages. This close approach, called a conjunction, will happen on December 21, but it will be visible December 16 to 25.

articles.title: Iran's parliament passes bill threatening to boost uranium enrichment and suspend inspectors
articles.description: Iran's parliament has passed a bill that would boost uranium enrichment to pre-2015 levels and block nuclear inspections if sanctions are not lifted, in the wake of the assassination of a top nuclear scientist.
